workDetails: Developed a financial reporting retrieval system by integrating AWS services and a custom-built Ruby web scraper, providing clients with new business insights and analysis during the market's transition to a T+1 time frame

Designed an event-driven ETL pipeline utilizing AWS S3, Lambda functions, and CloudFormation templates to process SEC failure-to-deliver data, streamlining data ingestion and enhancing operational efficiency

Engineered GitHub Action workflows to create a seamless deployment process, ensuring efficient integration and delivery of development and production changes, while expanding automated CI/CD pipelines
Utilized Python's Pandas library to process and examine portfolio CSV files, developing a tailored analysis that highlights shortfall implementation across the designated trading period
Streamlined financial data cleaning and integration, with Pandas, for seamless integration into Spotfire DXPs, optimizing our 'data-to-visualization' pipeline
Implemented new end-to-end functionality, incorporating Spotfire API integrations, that maintains stylistic uniformity and streamline user experience in the React/TypeScript front-end application
Leveraged MailChimp and Hubspot to build, design, and manage informational marketing campaigns, reaching over two thousand stakeholders on a weekly basis

Utilizes DaVinci Resolve Studio to create custom LUT files for daily production, ensuring consistent color space and exposure alignment across diverse camera systems, while adhering to the production's creative vision
Leverages Pomfort Silverstack for MD5 and xxHash-64 checksums during file transfer from camera media to production RAIDs, guaranteeing file security and mitigating opportunities for data corruption
Constructed a mobile LAN mesh network to enable comprehensive remote control of camera systems, ensuring seamless operation and enhanced accessibility throughout physical production
Designs and optimizes daily production strategies for technical camera systems, collaborating with production stakeholders to provide effective leadership and streamline operations

Integrates with post-production and visual effects departments to ensure proper transcoding and seamless delivery of captured data, facilitating a smooth transition from production to post-production workflows

Builds and maintains the proper functionality of all camera department related systems and technologies, ensuring readiness to learn and implement new technologies or systems as they arise each day, facilitating seamless adaptation and operational continuity
Responsible for overseeing the hiring, onboarding, and management of multiple camera teams throughout the entire production lifecycle, ensuring seamless integration and effective team collaboration

Integrates collaboratively across all on-set departments to address and fulfill all camera department requirements, proactively resolving issues and ensuring seamless coordination to support adherence to daily production timeline

Specializes in diverse camera technologies, including ARRI, Sony, and RED, and adept at navigating and optimizing proprietary camera systems to ensure optimal settings and functionality throughout production

Collaborates closely with Visual Effects departments to ensure accurate capture and recording of essential data per shot, facilitating seamless integration for the creation of computer-generated visuals aligned with captured media
